means: 亚述（西南亚洲底格里斯河流域的古国）

sentence.Network_en: The records of Assyria and Babylon are sparing in comparison.
sentence.Network_cn: 亚述和巴比伦的纪录比较起来则少得多.

sentence.Network_en: Assyria became the first power to expound the doctrine of blood and iron.
sentence.Network_cn: 亚述成了鼓吹血与铁的学说的第一个国家.

sentence.Network_en: It is difficult to discuss the administration of justice in Babylonia and Assyria.
sentence.Network_cn: 很难确定巴比伦和亚述的司法管辖权.

PerfectNetExp.abs: assymmetrical 非对称, assyria 亚述尔, assynthian 阿森特褶皱

means.word_mean: 1. an ancient kingdom in northern Mesopotamia which is in present-day Iraq

auth_sentence.content: The other significant community are Assyrians, the descendants of the ancient empires of Assyria and Babylonia.
